document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">grant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">days </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">flown! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">music </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Whippowil </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Oriole </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">done! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">bloom, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'll </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">skip </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">tomb </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">row </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">blossoms </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">o'er! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Pray </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">gather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Anemone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">flower </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">forevermore! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Summer for thee, grant I may be
